short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple calculator Chrome extension to perform basic calculations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FusionCalc (Memo Calculator) is now available for Chrome Extension.

Forget the frustration of traditional calculators. FusionCalc gives you the power to visually manage your calculations.

Imagine a sticky note for calculator:

* Drag & Drop Results: Effortlessly save calculated values on screen for later use.

* Keep Memo: Never forget what a number represents! Add quick notes for ultimate clarity.


FusionCalc is more than just a calculator, it's a workflow game-changer.

Also available for both iOS and Android apps!
